CHILDHOOD:
It's an interesting but complicated story.
She grew up in Hong Kong and raised up in a happy family. She is the only child but this doesn't make her feel lonely. She met a lot of friends in her school swimming team. During the 7 years sport training starting from primary 6 until form 6, she was taught to be a tough girl and know well how determination plays a critical role in achieving goals. Btw if you ever want to chat about something else, just say 'more'.
